item.magpie.description.aer: <GRAY~ITALIC>You feel the soft breeze beneath your feet
item.magpie.description.aether: <GRAY~ITALIC>All the elements imbue you with their strength
item.magpie.description.aqua: <GRAY~ITALIC>Fluidity of the water shapes you through and through
item.magpie.tooltip.aqua: <DARK_GREEN>Underwater breathing&nwln;Faster underwater mining, walking and swimming
item.magpie.description.melatonin_pill: <GRAY~ITALIC>May only the good dreams visit you in the night
item.magpie.tooltip.melatonin_pill: You can sleep even with the monsters nearby
item.magpie.tooltip.fork: <DARK_GREEN>ATK +2&nwln;ATK +6 during rain&nwln;<RED>0.3% chance to get hit by lightning if under rain
item.magpie.tooltip.ghost_in_a_jar: <DARK_GREEN>All outgoing damage ignores armor&nwln;<RED>All incoming damage ignores armor
item.magpie.tooltip.holy_grail: <DARK_GREEN>You can walk on water&nwln;<DARK_GREEN>Hold shift to sink
item.magpie.description.ignis: <GRAY~ITALIC>The intensity of the flame fills your body
item.magpie.tooltip.ignis: <DARK_GREEN>No fire and lava damage&nwln;Attacked entity is set on fire
item.magpie.description.jupiters_thunder: <GRAY~ITALIC>The divine lightning used to punish the guilty
item.magpie.tooltip.jupiters_thunderbolt: <DARK_GREEN>No lightning damage&nwln;20% chance to strike attacked entity with lightning
item.magpie.description.light_bulb: <GRAY~ITALIC>How much HP do you need to change a light bulb?
item.magpie.tooltip.lightning_arrester: <DARK_GREEN>No lightning damage&nwln;Recharges all equipped active artifacts if struck by lightning
item.magpie.description.lizards_tail: <GRAY~ITALIC>May the dexterity of the lizard be your lifeguard!
item.magpie.tooltip.lizards_tail: <DARK_GREEN>On fatal hit:&nwln;Ignore damage for 5 seconds&nwln;<RED>This artifact is dropped
item.magpie.description.lucky_boulder: <GRAY~ITALIC>You don't need luck to kill someone with this
item.magpie.description.mars_spear: <GRAY~ITALIC>The bloodshed caused by this spear invigorates you
item.magpie.tooltip.mars_spear: <DARK_GREEN>All outgoing melee damage doubles&nwln; <RED>All incoming melee damage doubles
item.magpie.tooltip.nerd_glasses: No effects affecting your vision are applied
item.magpie.description.plastic_spoon: <GRAY~ITALIC>Not the best thing to eat with
item.magpie.tooltip.plastic_spoon: <DARK_GREEN>30% chance to not consume stackable food after eating
item.magpie.tooltip.pocket: <DARK_GREEN>You can carry one more active artifact
item.magpie.tooltip.potted_cactus: <DARK_GREEN>30% of incoming damage is returned to attacker as prickly damage&nwln;No prickly damage
item.magpie.description.selenes_torch: <GRAY~ITALIC>This divine torch will ward away the darkness in your way
item.magpie.description.terra: <GRAY~ITALIC>You feel the strength of the earth in your limbs
item.magpie.tooltip.terra: <DARK_GREEN>You get no knockback&nwln;Hit enemies are thrown away
item.magpie.description.bag_of_dust: <GRAY~ITALIC>You feel the physics changing on command
item.magpie.tooltip.vampire_fang: <DARK_GREEN>Heal by a small portion of a killed entities HP
item.magpie.description.wasp_nest: <GRAY~ITALIC>You've got angry wasps in your stomach!
item.magpie.tooltip.wasp_nest: <DARK_GREEN>On incoming damage spawns Wasps targeted at the attacker
item.magpie.tooltip.yang: <DARK_GREEN>During day:&nwln;ATK +3&nwln;SPD +20%&nwln;<RED>During night:&nwln;SPD -20% if Yin not equipped
item.magpie.tooltip.yin: <DARK_GREEN>During night:&nwln;ATK +3&nwln;SPD +20%&nwln;<RED>During day:&nwln;SPD -20% if Yin not equipped
